snippet: To justify a security crackdown, the Egyptian media has deployed the theme tune from “Rocky,” reworked anti-Obama conspiracy theories and even tossed in a reference to “Curb Your Enthusiasm.”
abstract: To justify a security crackdown, the Egyptian media has deployed the theme tune from “Rocky,” reworked anti-Obama conspiracy theories and even tossed in a reference to “Curb Your Enthusiasm.”

headline.main: Egypt's Media Cheers on Army Crackdown
